translations: 借喻的；具有人的形象的；比喻的

sentences.sentence: A figural design; the figurative art of the humanistic tradition-herbert read.
sentences.translation: 象征性的图案；人文主义传统象征艺术-何伯特·鲁德。

sentences.sentence: The best part of new figural water-ink is the value of realistic solicitude the painting works express.
sentences.translation: 新具象水墨最为感人的地方在于他们的作品中体现出来的现实关怀的价值。
